description: From Latin eventilatus, past participle of eventilare (“to fan”). See ventilate.

verbs.description: eventilate (third-person singular simple present eventilates, present participle eventilating, simple past and past participle eventilated)

examples: I cannot forbear to touch another circumstance which might seem at first to be a miracle of Nature, beyond the causes which I have alledg'd; but having well eventilated it we shall find that it depends upon the same principles.
